type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Extra Origins](https://github.com/MoriyaShiine/extra-origins/wiki) to be installed! ⚠️

Prevents mobs from attacking the entity unless the entity attacks first.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Extra Origins](https://github.com/MoriyaShiine/extra-origins/wiki) to be installed! ⚠️

Prevents mobs from attacking the entity unless the entity attacks first.

inverted.description: If true, the power will prevent all mobs except the specified mobs from attacking the entity.
inverted.markdownDescription: If true, the power will prevent all mobs except the specified mobs from attacking the entity.
